name: Conway Nicholson
comment: “You cannot continue to victimize someone else just because you yourself were a victim once—there has to be a limit”

name: Cooper Fulton
comment: “We can not fight for our rights and our history as well as future until we are armed with weapons of criticism and dedicated consciousness.”

name: Clay Jimenez
comment: “How much longer is the world willing to endure this spectacle of wanton cruelty?”

name: Hodges Beck
comment: “For if life had taught her anything, it was that healing and peace can begin only with acknowledgment of wrongs committed.”

name: Fisher Barber
comment: “Sometimes a homeland becomes a tale. We love the story because it is about our homeland and we love our homeland even more because of the story.”

name: Terra Santos
comment: “The west need someone to tell the man who walks around with the biggest stick in the world, that that stick can`t bring down God`s house.”
